Package it.cnr.isti.thematrix.scripting.sys

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Operation<T1,T2,R>
    An Operation is a binary function that given two values of type T1 and T2 returns a third value of type R.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractOperation<T1,T2,R>
    A default implementation for the Operation interface, with a nicer AbstractOperation.toString() method
    AbstractOperation2<T,R>
    A default implementation for an abstract operation where the two types T1 and T2 match (that is, T1==T2)
    DatasetRecord
    A DatasetRecord is a symbol table that represents a row in a dataset.
    DatasetSchema
    A DatasetSchema is a SymbolTable that represents the schema for a DatasetRecord.
    Literal<T>
    A literal is a symbol with a hardcoded name that represents the row, column at which it was found in the source file.
    MappingUtils
    Class collecting various static utility functions operating on the class hierarchy holding the mapping information
    MatrixModule
    The base class for each module of the Matrix scripting language
    ModuleGraphPostprocessor
    (Experimental) class to hold methods that query and modify the ModuleTable of the interpreter (defined in TheMatrixSys).
    ModuleTable
    A simple Map from module name to MatrixModule.
    OpTable
    A Map holding Operation objects.
    SchemaTable
    A simple Map from schema names to DatasetSchema.
    Symbol<T>
    A Symbol represents an attribute of a dataset or a variable of the script.
    SymbolMissing  
    SymbolTable
    A SymbolTable is a Map from String to Symbol, where the String key is always the value Symbol.getName() in the given symbol This implementation does not return null when a key is missing, but it throws a MissingSymbolException
    TheMatrixIADDefinition
    Class packaging definitions for TheMatrix interpreter for the sake of code modularization.
    TheMatrixSys
    Main class of the TheMatrix interpreter, holding the common definitions and objects needed by the interpreter.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MismatchedSchemaException
    signals when
    MissingFieldException  
    MissingModuleException  
    MissingOperationException  
    MissingSymbolException  
    RedefinedModuleNameException  
    UncompatibleTypeException  
    UndefinedFunctionException  
    UndefinedModuleNameException
